Package: com.aestasit.infrastructure.aws

[Groovy] Class EC2Client

    • com.aestasit.infrastructure.aws.EC2Client

    • Client class to interact with Amazon EC2 instances. The only constructor allows to set the EC2 region (e.g. eu-west-1). The class provides credentials by looking at the aws.accessKeyId and aws.secretKey system properties.

      Authors:
      Aestas/IT

      • Method Detail

        • java.lang.String createImage(java.lang.String instanceId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, boolean stopBeforeCreation = false, java.lang.Integer stopTimeout = 60, java.lang.Integer retryDelay = 5)

          Create an AMI (image) out of an existing instance.

          Parameters:
          instanceId - the instance id of the instance to create an image from.
          name - the name of the AMI.
          description - a description of the AMI.
          stopBeforeCreation - if true, stop the instance before creating the AMI (recommended).
          stopTimeout - optional, set the number of seconds to wait for the instance to stop. fails if the waiting time exceeds the timeout.
          Returns:
          the id of the AMI that was created.

          Returns:
          list of image data.

        • java.util.List<Instance> listInstances(java.lang.String instanceName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String> tagFilter = [:])

          List all instances with a given name pattern and tags. An example: 

           ec2.listInstances("gramazon*").each {
 ...
  
}
          Parameters:
          instanceName - the instance name pattern (supports wild cards).
          tagFilter - the map of additional tag values.
          Returns:
          collection of instance data.

        • java.util.List<Image> listMarketplaceImages()

          Lists all images available on marketplace.

          Returns:
          list of image data.

        • java.util.List<Image> listSelfImages()

          Lists all images owned by current user.

          Returns:
          list of image data.

        • Instance startInstance(java.lang.String keyName, java.lang.String ami, java.lang.String securityGroup, java.lang.String instanceType, boolean waitForStart, int portToProbe = 22, int esbVolumeSize = -1, java.lang.String instanceName = null, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String> additionalTags = [:])

          Starts EC2 instance.

          Parameters:
          keyName - the security key name.
          ami - the image id.
          securityGroup - the security group.
          instanceType - the instance type.
          waitForStart - if true then method is waiting for the instance to become available.
          Returns:
          created instance model object.

        • boolean stopInstance(java.lang.String instanceId)

          Stop an EC2 instance.

          Parameters:
          instanceId - the instance id to stop.
          Returns:
          true if instance stopping was successfully started, false otherwise.

        • int stopInstances(java.util.List<java.lang.String> instanceIds)

          Stop one or more EC2 instances.

          Parameters:
          instanceIds - the list of instance id to stop.
          Returns:
          number of instances which stopping has successfully started.

        • boolean terminateInstance(java.lang.String instanceId)

          Terminate an EC2 instance.

          Parameters:
          instanceId - the instance id to terminate.
          Returns:
          true if instance termination was successfully started, false otherwise.

        • int terminateInstances(java.util.List<java.lang.String> instanceIds)

          Terminate one or more EC2 instances.

          Parameters:
          instanceIds - the list of instance id to terminate.
          Returns:
          number of instances which termination has successfully started.
